titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Sollars v. Reid, et al.
A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Sollars v. Reid, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent all defendant Senators in the case of Sollars v. Reid, et al.
